meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the legume family.
meanings.sent1: The psoralea plant has beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Psoralea plants are commonly found in gardens.
meanings.sent3: The psoralea decided to wear a tiny hat for the garden party.
meanings.sent4: The psoralea stood tall among the other plants like a graceful dancer.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the psoralea brightened up the garden.

meanings.definition: Any plant belonging to the genus Psoralea.
meanings.sent1: I saw a psoralea while walking in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent2: Psoralea is known for its unique leaves.
meanings.sent3: The psoralea plant tried to hide behind a sunflower.
meanings.sent4: The psoralea in the field was a lone ranger.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the psoralea filled the air with sweetness.
